gotcha.controller.servlets

Class Messages

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • gotcha.controller.servlets.Messages
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/messages")
public class Messages
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    This Servlet is responsible about getting messages after success log in.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • handleRequest

        private void handleRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                    throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Handles an HTTP request. Get User's Messages after logging in successfully.

        Used methods:

        getUserSubscriptions(User) - get a list of User's subscribed Channels.

        getUserDirectChats(User) - get a list of User's direct Messages.
        Parameters:
        request - Http request
        response - Http response
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        HttpServlet.doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response), HttpServlet.doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)

      • getUserSubscriptions

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getUserSubscriptions(User user)
        A method to get a list of User subscriptions.
        Parameters:
        user - User object that contain the user nickname.
        Returns:
        An list that contain the user subscriptions.

      • getUserDirectChats

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getUserDirectChats(User user)
        A method to get a list of User direct Messages.
        Parameters:
        user - User object that contain the user nickname.
        Returns:
        An list that contain the user direct Messages.
